channel.title: [s.off]Be happy?[s.off]
channel.description:
Lmao, I got a nice cape template from someone.. silentCJ thanks :D. Ontopic.. this is a cape I made out of complete boredom it took like 5 minutes tops so um.. yeah be harsh XD
[img]http://i26.tinypic.com/2qmdw1k.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i27.tinypic.com/2zz2esk.jpg[/img]

item.title: [s.off]Be happy?[s.off]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

S I N N E R:

Im loving the negative feedback… It seems as people don’t know what boredom can result to…

Umm, boredom can result in amazing models. I do models when i get bored. Because if i’m not bored, it means im occupied, and i’m not on the computer when i’m occupied. Normally i’m outside working on my car.

[quote=“S I N N E R, post:15, topic:290120”][quote author=jjones10 link=topic=383505.msg2879395#msg2879395 date=1248235611]

Im loving the negative feedback… It seems as people don’t know what boredom can result to…

For one thing, boredom does NOT lead to a 3 minute model. Boredom leads to a model that took actual work.

He’s calling you Stupid when he’s wasting his time posting. If you don’t like his Model then Gtfo, It doesn’t make you look any better if you flame him.

If you DO like his model, then gtfo. It makes you look like a moron noob for supporting this kind of work
[/quote]

lmao? can you explain why sheer boredom wouldn’t result to a three minute model. It gave me a laugh, and to be honest I think you’re trying to look like a big guy around here, with your flaming and terrible feedback.[/quote]
Umm, also on this, no he probably cannot explain how boredom can result in good models, because boredom is what feeds allot of us modelers, or if your me, your programming as well. Lately I have been doing to Davenport U. for webdesign and such. Only a summer course though. Yet, guess how I signed up for that? SHEER BOREDOM!!

Read full topic

item.title: [s.off]Be happy?[s.off]
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Floris says:
Can you like post a reply for me @ a post?^.^
Floris says:
Don’t think this will get accepted by a mod (moderated )
Person. says:
?
Floris says:
@@ that smiley face thing
Floris says:
can you post this pls:
Floris says:

[quote=" Assassins Creed Fan :Today"]Be happy?
Are you serious?!?
Why would we be happy with an effin recolor with an amateur thingy added?
We are trying to get [u]PAST the recoloring time…
You are not ‘Creative’ with this model, this is a recolor
How can a recolor be creative tell me that.

  • Assassins Creed Fan.[/quote]

ACF asked me to post this…If you did not read above. So, whatever. Though I do agree with him…As I posted above.

I r Pwn u:

I Don’t like you flamers, He actually tried to do something unlike some of you. (NOT ALL OF YOU)

I post my models occasionally. And they arn’t crappy recolors. Tried to do something? He made a smiley face.

I know, it’s just your most likely going to get flamed for posting recolors on here…Everyone hates them, make some good custom ones. And if you still get flamed, at least you won’t be copying jagex still.
